title: Your Shop
body: Hey Riot so i already own every skin with the exception of some super exclusive ones and my shop hasnt offered me any of the ones i dont own? Feeling like i got cheesed a little bit,

replies.body:
I know the Your Shop has always been in a bit of an odd spot for people who own all/almost all skins. There are limitations to what skins can appear in the special shop so that's probably why you aren't seeing some of the ones you don't own.

>What skins won’t be included in my ‘Your Shop’?

>  *  Legendary Skins
 * Ultimate Skins
 * Champions or skins released within 90 days of Your Shop's start time.
 * Limited Skins
 * Loot Exclusive Skins
 * Skins that are on sale during the offers
 * Skins not sold for RP (bundle-exclusives, Victorious skins, Prestige skins, etc.)
